title: It's Finally Christmas
description: Holiday Greene just broke up with her ex-boyfriend during the summer. All she wants instead is to not think about it and spend more time with her family. Then one fall day in October, she is offered a job for her town’s Christmas holiday stroll to plan and decorate before December 12th. Feeling excited, but nervous, Holiday takes the job. On her first day on the job, she meets Nick, the handsome co-worker to the holiday stroll who cares less about the event at all. Nick is more worried about his son Chip who has an illness and may die from it. Holiday, feeling sad for Nick and for his son decides to plan something wonderful for both of them.As Holiday works her magic plan from Nick, each day they get to understand each other and create a bond like nothing before. But Holiday questions herself: Will it be the perfect surprise for Nick and Chip? Will she realize that Nick was her second chance of love from the beginning? And will she know that it’s finally Christmas in her heart and for her town?
author: Bobby Hannafey
